title: Finance BPR Test Process Lead
summary: We are looking for a Finance Test Process Lead who embodies our culture and core values. As a member of Finance BPR team, you’ll help drive strategic projects across the organization. You will be joining a team of project management professionals who lead initiatives with our business partners and information technology team.
description: Define and Drive the QA vision for end to end functional testing for key platforms and applications Communication and co-ordination with globally distributed teams Work closely with internal organisations, project teams and stakeholders to develop project schedules, execute test plans and cases, and deliver high quality products Enhance testing processes, environments, tools, and frameworks Act as a strong advocate for quality in the product development process for software engineering Champion Apple’s dedication to providing an extraordinary user experience and drives the team to work towards this shared goal. Uphold Apple’s ethical and moral standards while working with internal and external partners. - Form the team on the foundation of excellence, professional growth, inclusivity, and respect.
preferred_qualifications: Experience in testing/test management of S/4 Hana Implementations Experience in presenting executive-level briefs for business reviews, forecast delivery schedules, and risk mitigations Deep Inquisitive mind and ability to bring in change
